comment: Three Coppers stabbed in North London last night. No description of the perpetrators, but I'm laying bets on names like Jemal, Leroy Winston, Mohammed....
amr:
# ::snt Three Coppers stabbed in North London last night. No description of the perpetrators, but I'm laying bets on names like Jemal, Leroy Winston, Mohammed....
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / stab-01
            :ARG1 (c / cop
                  :quant 3)
            :location (c2 / city-district
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "North"
                        :op2 "London"))
            :time (d / date-entity
                  :dayperiod (n2 / night)
                  :mod (y / yesterday)))
      :snt2 (c3 / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (d2 / describe-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 (p / person
                        :ARG0-of (p2 / perpetrate-01)))
            :ARG2 (b / bet-01
                  :ARG0 (ii / i)
                  :ARG2 (n3 / name
                        :example (a / and
                              :op1 (p3 / person
                                    :name (n4 / name
                                          :op1 "Jemal"))
                              :op2 (p4 / person
                                    :name (n5 / name
                                          :op1 "Leroy"
                                          :op2 "Winston"))
                              :op3 (p5 / person
                                    :name (n6 / name
                                          :op1 "Mohammed")))))))

comment: Hi there, please refrain from using derogatory comments in the thread. They are hurtful and unwanted. If you continue Admin will be alerted
amr:
# ::snt Hi there, please refrain from using derogatory comments in the thread. They are hurtful and unwanted. If you continue Admin will be alerted
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / say-01
            :ARG1 (h / hi)
            :ARG2 (t / there))
      :snt2 (r / refrain-01
            :mode imperative
            :polite +
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (u / use-01
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (c / comment-01
                        :mod (d / derogatory))
                  :location (t2 / thread)))
      :snt3 (a / and
            :op1 (h2 / hurtful)
            :op2 (w / want-01
                  :polarity -)
            :domain (t3 / they))
      :snt4 (a2 / alert-01
            :ARG1 (p / person
                  :ARG0-of (a3 / administrate-01))
            :condition (c2 / continue-01
                  :ARG0 y)))

comment: Refrain from using the term "retarded."  Many people find it offensive regardless of the context.
amr:
# ::snt Refrain from using the term "retarded."  Many people find it offensive regardless of the context.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (r / refrain-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (u / use-01
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (t / term-01
                        :ARG1 (r2 / retard-01))))
      :snt2 (f / find-02
            :ARG0 (p / person
                  :quant (m2 / many))
            :ARG1 (o / offend-01
                  :ARG0 (ii / it))
            :ARG1-of (r3 / regardless-91
                  :ARG2 (c / context))))

comment: Using the word 'retarded' is offensive to the mentally disable since its a direct attack to their disability. Refrain from such words.
amr:
# ::snt Using the word 'retarded' is offensive to the mentally disable since its a direct attack to their disability. Refrain from such words.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (o / offend-01
            :ARG0 (u / use-01
                  :ARG1 (w / word
                        :ARG1-of (r / retard-01)))
            :ARG1 (p / person
                  :ARG1-of (d / disable-01
                        :mod (m2 / mental)))
            :ARG1-of (c / cause-01
                  :ARG0 (a / attack-01
                        :ARG0 u
                        :ARG1 (d2 / disability
                              :poss p)
                        :ARG1-of (d3 / direct-02))))
      :snt2 (r2 / refrain-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (w2 / word
                  :mod (s / such))))
